data.name: Space SEX: Judgment Day
data.detailed_description:
Soar into a new level of sexiness, craziness and ridiculousness, as the Space SEX adventure continues. Make it your Primary Mission to slay one *crazy hot* green Alien!

Leveling Up the Story
Every successful sci-fi franchise has one thing in common: their second installment takes the original story to the next F*CKING LEVEL! Well, now it’s our turn to show you what’s to come.

New characters, double the content
Picking up just after the Lustful Alien Lifeform let Chief Povan know who’s boss, we now follow the story of Dr. Lance Longdaddy. As the space station’s resident Doctor (and unapologetic Dolt), get yourself tangled up in all sorts of mayhem!

Would you like to know more?

  • 5 Steamy new encounters, including threesomes and “out of this world” experiences.
  • New and returning faces, spacey bodies and far out scenarios!
  • Double the content found in Space SEX’s first chapter.
  • Supports No-VR mode, with only a PC & mouse (no VR headset).
  • VR support for HTC Vive and Oculus Rift with Touch.
  • What, no mention of threesomes? Oh wait, we did. Let’s mention it again!

We’re rocketing Space SEX into the future, with this *shiny wet* new content.
The troubles aboard the PHALLACEIUS are really starting to heat up!

data.short_description: Soar into a new level of sexiness, craziness and ridiculousness, as the Space SEX adventure continues. Make it your Primary Mission to slay one *crazy hot* green Alien!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit or greater
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD R9 290 equivalent or greater
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit or greater
  • Processor: Intel i5-6500 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 or AMD R9 390 equivalent or greater

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This game features nudity, adult language, consensual sex and playful spanking.  All the characters in the game are 18 years old and over.
